root: ^This is a test of the name / portrait system using tags.

c-0: ^Ughhh, not again. Texas summers are awful.
^For real. Make sure to bring water with you.
c-1: ^Ooh, nice and chilly. I hope there's wind.
^Then I can finally wear some layers!
c-2: ^Hey, at least there'll be rain, right?
^Yeah, but then it'll be muggy tomorrow.
g-0: ^Whatever it'll be like tomorrow, I'll probably end up staying inside.
^I'll do that too, but after I can walk home.
